title: Derafshifar Stadium
text:
Derafshifar Stadium (<a href="Persian%20language">Persian</a>: ورزشگاه درفشی فر) is the <a href="training%20ground">training ground</a> and <a href="Football%20academy">Academy</a> base of <a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a>. It is located in the Jannatabad neighborhood of <a href="Tehran">Tehran</a>. 
Inside the complex, there are training areas, hotel and pools. There are also a sauna, steam and weight rooms, a restaurant, conference rooms and offices.
